item.title: Install Nginx, Mysql
item.description: OVERVIEW Quick note about Install Nginx + Mysql INSTALL NGINX Step 1: ssh to the server and run sudo apt update sudo apt install nginx Step 2: Check nginx installed & running sudo nginx -v sudo systemctl status nginx You can see this Congratuation!!! INSTALL MYSQL Step 1: ssh to the server and run sudo apt update sudo apt install nginx Step 2: Check nginx installed & running sudo nginx -v sudo systemctl status nginx You can see this
